name: STAR SALVAGER (Early Access)
description:
A RETRO ROGUELIKE ACTION-PUZZLER Purchase comes with a retail Steam Key (a $20 value). Salvage your way through a sea of space junk. Take on the alien horde with the ultimate custom-fitted fighting drone. Cabinet-style arcade combat mixed with falling block combo-making, man.

FEATURES

  • A totally original core gameplay loop - feels like breakdancing in space
  • Horrible-adorable enemies with silly names
  • Procedurally generated maps. Each run is WILDLY different. (Okay not that different)
  • A roguelike metagame to keep you grinding for infinitesimal morsels of progress until you can’t remember what day it is
  • A groovy synth soundtrack that’s worth the price of the game right there
  • Mildly entertaining dialogue delivered by two dimensional characters who don’t move their lips
ACTION

PUZZLES

PARTS

JOIN US

This game is an early development build. We're looking for player feedback to help us balance and refine the game. Join our Discord to be a part of the conversation, or leave your comments in the thread.

If this looks interesting, but you'd rather wait until the full release before shelling out your hard-earned coin, why not WISHLIST US ON STEAM

Thanks so much for stopping by.  We appreciate you!!!
